attributes.action: CANCEL THE JANUARY BTEC EXAMS FOR 2021!
attributes.additional_details: We are all students we all deserve the right to be equal, some people have vulnerable people that may god forbid can lose their life's and can also carry the virus why is the government not mentioning anything about us btec students and why are they acting like we are immune to this virus, ARE WE NOT HUMANS TOO?
attributes.background: I believe this is unfair on all 135,000 btec students that are taking their exam this week and next week the fact that we have already lost 4 months of education last year had made the exams really hard for us and right now cancelling A levels and Gcses are really unfair on all us btec students
